name: Yaoi Game Jam Submission
description:
Hi, this is my first game, I know its not very good, sorry, I just really liked games and wanted to make my own for once and saw the perfect oprotunity as i am currently struggling to come out to friends and family and this game really helped me build up confidence to tell the world. I hope you enjoy!

-ThugFlavored
